org.sakaiproject.memory.impl

Class HardCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.memory.impl.MemCache
      • org.sakaiproject.memory.impl.HardCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer, org.sakaiproject.memory.api.Cache, org.sakaiproject.memory.api.Cacher
    Deprecated.  


    public class HardCache
extends MemCache

    HardCache is a MemCache set to use hard, not soft references.

      • HardCache

        public HardCache(BasicMemoryService memoryService,
         org.sakaiproject.event.api.EventTrackingService eventTrackingService,
         org.sakaiproject.memory.api.CacheRefresher refresher,
         String pattern,
         net.sf.ehcache.Ehcache cache)
        Deprecated. 
        Construct the Cache. Attempts to keep complete on Event notification by calling the refresher.
        Parameters:
        refresher - The object that will handle refreshing of event notified modified or added entries.
        pattern - The "startsWith()" string for all resources that may be in this cache - if null, don't watch events for updates.

      • HardCache

        public HardCache(BasicMemoryService memoryService,
         org.sakaiproject.event.api.EventTrackingService eventTrackingService,
         org.sakaiproject.memory.api.CacheRefresher refresher,
         long sleep,
         net.sf.ehcache.Ehcache cache)
        Deprecated. 
        Construct the Cache. Automatic refresh handling if refresher is not null.
        Parameters:
        refresher - The object that will handle refreshing of expired entries.
        sleep - The number of seconds to sleep between expiration checks.

      • HardCache

        public HardCache(BasicMemoryService memoryService,
         org.sakaiproject.event.api.EventTrackingService eventTrackingService,
         long sleep,
         String pattern,
         net.sf.ehcache.Ehcache cache)
        Deprecated. 
        Construct the Cache. No automatic refresh: expire only, from time and events.
        Parameters:
        sleep - The number of seconds to sleep between expiration checks.
        pattern - The "startsWith()" string for all resources that may be in this cache - if null, don't watch events for updates.
